newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico cattle report, feeder export price - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Mexico cattle report, feeder export price - USDA.

text.p: USDA reported Wednesday that around 1,450 cattle were exported into the United States at three crossing points Tuesday.
Through Laredo, Texas, around 1,000 steer calves sold steady, in moderate trade with good demand.
Prices for head weighing 300-400 lb were 92-102 cents/lb and for 400-500 lb head at 82-99 cents/lb.
Through Del Rio, Texas, around 150 head were sold, although not enough to establish trend prices.
Through Eagle Pass, Texas, another 300 head were sold, although again not enough to establish market trend prices.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom +525 7289530)) E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com
